dialogue.text: Yeah... I don't understand a thing...
Hey there... I believe you can understand me now
I didn't know you were able to speak my language
We from the village heard a loud weird noise and I volunteered to investigate. Are you perhaps responsible for this loud noise?
(Hmm, she must be talking about when I landed here) Yeah...sorry about that. I've come here to search for a missing person. Have you perhaps had some travelers that looks similar to me?
A traveler that looks like you...Not that I can recall. I can ask around the village for you but I doubt that someone has seen someone as unique like you. That would be the buzz around town!
Anyways, I don't think I can allow passage for you to the village. I must discuss this with the elders first. You know how old people are, always wary of strangers
You can use the abandoned farmhouse. I don't think you need permission to use the things there so you can farm or craft till your hearts content
Just be sure to plant the seeds inside of the garden and there will be no problems
Oh, names, Jane by the way...forgot to mention that
Thanks, Jane! My name is Fiona! Happy meeting you
